Nightligth:

Nightlight followed him


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> He smiles as he works.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Well this is an energon processor. All Transformers 
who consume energon have one. When we take in raw energon of any form 
it passes through this machine whick changes it slightly. After this 
machine is done, the energon then goes and powers different parts of 
our bodies.
> 
> He pauses as some sparks fly from the tools.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Vampirtron said that he could only have energon that 
came from Transformer bodies. All he'll have to do is take any of our 
normal energon and process it through this machine. Then it will be 
energon that he can have. It will seem as if the energon had came 
from within a Transformer.
> 
> Roddy turns off the tool he was working with.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Finished. Let's get this back to Vampirtron.
> 
> Roddy grabs the processor and starts to walk back to the med bay.
